resources.string: InstantSend payment does not support a high amount of payment, and the current amount of payment has exceeded %s

This InstantSend payment has not been transmitted yet.

This InstantSend payment is awaiting verification by the Safe Network.
This InstantSend payment has been verified by the Safe Network.
This is your recovery phrase. Please write it down.
DO NOT let anyone see your recovery phrase or they can spend your Safe. This phrase is not compatible with other Safe Software.
Your wallet is protected by a spending PIN. Enter your PIN and press Show to view your recovery phrase.
Collect information about your issue and email your report to the developers.
No fee of will be paid. Use \'no fee\' only if you don\'t care about confirmation time.
